## BundleItem.option\_id property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use `uid` instead
> 

An ID assigned to each type of item in a bundle product.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
option_id?: Maybe<Scalars['Int']>;
```
